name: 50th Anniversary of David Carnegie as partner in Carnegie & Co.
obverse: Bust of David Carnegie facing left.
reverse: A port with a large factory in the center.
reverse_inscriptions: HALFSEKELS MINNE. 1836-1886 TILL FÖRMÄN OCH ARBETARE.
description: This medal was made for the workers of the company.
3 examples in gold were given to Carnegie and his children.
701 examples were made for the workers. This medal is in the original case.
